name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.60 - The Table Hockey
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Recreating table hockey game at overwhelming speed! Experience arcade excitement at home!
The standard game table hockey in game centre is now available on SIMPLE series.
A more thrilling "Item Mode" , as well as more than 10 original and unique tables are included.
Here comes a simple and exciting game for you to enjoy anytime.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PS3™ or PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
